STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchanter : une créature que vous contrôlez
エンチャント（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) attach_filter:SetController( EffectController() )

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャントされているクリーチャーは＋３/＋３の修整を受ける。
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Power_Add( 3 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Toughness_Add( 3 ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
All’inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica una creatura.
Opfere zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine Kreatur.
Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez une créature.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica una criatura.
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、クリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
В начале вашего шага поддержки пожертвуйте существо.
No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique uma criatura.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetController( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, player ) player:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE", EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if ( target ~= nil ) then target:Sacrifice( target:GetPlayer() ) end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end
